text:
These campaigns aren’t cheap: 

Canada has shelled out roughly $1.74m (£1.37m), has 13 full-time staff on the campaign, and Mr Trudeau has travelled overseas to secure votes
 
As of late last year, Ireland spent a reported $800,000 and Norway $2.8m https://t.co/1cO5wd2kSY https://t.co/xTdIiuPdDB

text:
